articles.title: ‘This is kidnapping — plain and simple’: ICE arrests 9 employees at Allston car wash
articles.description:
The employees were detained Tuesday morning before they could present their documents, according to the car wash’s manager.

The post ‘This is kidnapping — plain and simple’: ICE arrests 9 employees at Allston car wash appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ICE arrested 9 employees at an Allston car wash on November 4.
The arrests occurred before employees could present their documents, according to the manager.
Local community members express concern over the impact on immigrant workers and families.

articles.title: Patriots opt to stand pat at trade deadline
articles.description:
"We’re eight games into what we feel like is a program that we want to build."

The post Patriots opt to stand pat at trade deadline appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots decided not to make trades at the NFL deadline on November 1.
Team is focused on building a program after eight games this season.
Local fans may see a consistent roster as the team develops its strategy.

articles.title: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy warns of ‘mass chaos’ in skies if shutdown continues
articles.description:
Last weekend saw some of the worst staff shortages and on Sunday, flights at Newark Liberty International Airport in New Jersey were delayed for several hours.

The post Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy warns of ‘mass chaos’ in skies if shutdown continues appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy warns of potential flight disruptions affecting Boston residents.
Recent staff shortages caused significant delays at Newark Liberty International Airport last weekend.
Continued shutdown could lead to widespread chaos in air travel for Boston travelers.
